b2ch1.title: Bearer of bad news
b2ch1.caption: Volunteer to take the role that nobody else wants to take.

b2ch1.title: Long-distance
b2ch1.caption: Find out the reason why Daren decided to create his enchanted transceivers.

b2ch1.title: Second piece of the puzzle
b2ch1.caption: Find the second piece of the puzzle made by Varathia's greatest architect.

b2ch1.title: Half-breed
b2ch1.caption: Find out an interesting detail about your lineage.

b2ch2.title: Come at me, bro!
b2ch2.caption: Take all of your opponent's hits head-on, instead of trying to defend yourself.

b2ch2.title: The easy way out
b2ch2.caption: Accept the help of a shady individual, without lying to him, in exchange for making your life easier in the arena.

b2ch2.title: Fourth wall breaker
b2ch2.caption: Make a reference that your game character would have no way of knowing without breaking the fourth wall.

b2ch2.title: Griffin rider
b2ch2.caption: Ride a griffin and live to tell the tale.

b2ch3.title: Once an enemy, now an ally
b2ch3.caption: Convince an enemy troll to join your side.

b2ch3.title: The golden cage
b2ch3.caption: Find out why Illuna can cast the spirit fox's golden cage.

b2ch41.title: Not a team player
b2ch41.caption: Get two of the members from your division killed, through your actions.

b2ch41.title: Intimidation successful
b2ch41.caption: Manage to avoid an assassination attempt by intimidating your adversary into not attacking you.

b2ch41.title: Hadrik saves the day!
b2ch41.caption: Witness Hadrik's second fight in the arena.

b2ch41.title: A calculated risk
b2ch41.caption: Sometimes it's better to take small risks than to go the extra mile just to be completely certain.

b2ch42.title: Spear thrower
b2ch42.caption: Kill a manticore in mid-flight, by throwing a spear at it.

b2ch42.title: Who needs stats?
b2ch42.caption: Win the first round of the arena without any points in your stats, and without help from the scythe wielding lessathi.

b2ch42.title: Time stop
b2ch42.caption: Witness Rose subconsciously casting a time freezing spell, for the first time.

b2ch42.title: The assassin's motive
b2ch42.caption: Find out the assassin's reason for wanting to kill you in the arena.

b2ch5.title: Tribal dancer
b2ch5.caption: Perform a tribal dance while dodging pillars of fire.

b2ch5.title: Divide and conquer
b2ch5.caption: Win against the troll by turning his own allies against him.

b2ch5.title: Public speaker
b2ch5.caption: Hold a speech in front of the arena crowds, after one of your victories.

b2ch5.title: United we stand
b2ch5.caption: Get Wilhelm and the gladiator that you fight against in the third round to join your team in the bonus round.

b2ch6.title: Secret code discovered
b2ch6.caption: Learn about a secret code that gives you a temporary bonus to your Hearing stat.

b2ch6.title: Living on the edge
b2ch6.caption: Expend most of your budget with a single purchase.

b2ch7.title: Just an average assassin
b2ch7.caption: Complete king Golmyck's mission without having any points invested in your stats.

b2ch7.title: Found the culprit
b2ch7.caption: Find out who sabotaged Golmyck's telepathic message device.

b2ch7.title: Message delivered
b2ch7.caption: Deliver Eiden's still winter message to its rightful recipients.

b2ch7.title: Message delivered
b2ch7.caption: Survive the powerful grip of a giant stone hand, without getting crushed.

b2ch8.title: Stillwater trivia
b2ch8.caption: Find out important information about the stillwaters, and their origins.

b2ch8.title: Unexpected savior
b2ch8.caption: When you are in a pinch, help does not always come from where you'd expect.

b2ch8.title: Tree wielder
b2ch8.caption: Who needs weapons, when you can just use trees as clubs?

b2ch8.title: Side effects
b2ch8.caption: Experience first-hand the side effects of your protection spell.

b2ch8.title: A true gentleman
b2ch8.caption: Offer to take an extra night shift, in order to make sure that your lady guest gets a good night's sleep.

b2ch9.title: Something is missing
b2ch9.caption: Does this backpack feel lighter to anyone else, or is it just me?

b2ch9.title: I'm a helper!
b2ch9.caption: Help the animals in the forest to complete their mission.

b2ch9.title: Long live the king!
b2ch9.caption: Learn a shocking truth about the current state of affairs in Thilias.

b2ch9.title: Master of cards
b2ch9.caption: Win a card game against Hadrik.

b2ch10.title: A creative solution
b2ch10.caption: Not all battles need to be won through fighting.

b2ch10.title: Mammoth slayer
b2ch10.caption: Kill a mammoth with your own hands.

b2ch10.title: Demolition man
b2ch10.caption: You seem to really enjoy smashing big rocks into one another. Ever thought about doing this for a living?

b2ch10.title: Stalker detected
b2ch10.caption: Do you ever get the feeling that you are being watched?

b2ch11.title: Supportive friend
b2ch11.caption: Encourage a friend who just had an epiphany and wants to change their life for the better.

b2ch11.title: Madman
b2ch11.caption: Attack Arraka with a dagger for the second time, and live to tell the tale.

b2ch11.title: Cutthroat vs god
b2ch11.caption: Witness an epic confrontation between a cutthroat and a god.

b2ch11.title: Average Joe 2
b2ch11.caption: Finished the first two books without leveling up a single stat.

b2ch11.title: A hidden truth
b2ch11.caption: Find out what happened to Barry's biological parents.

b2ch11.title: The elephant in the room
b2ch11.caption: There's always that one guy who can't take a hint and who doesn't realize that some things are better left unsaid.
